entry.name: SpaceMarines/TechmarineDescription
entry.value: Technician and engineer as well as a full Astartes battle-brother.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/TechmarineFlavor
entry.value: They learn how to divine the runes of engineering and study the liturgy of maintenance. This great body of lore must be committed to memory and understood by the novice Techmarine.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/KillTeamEliminatorsDescription
entry.value: Cloaked infantry unit equipped to bring down any target.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/KillTeamEliminatorsFlavor
entry.value: Once marked, there is nowhere for an Eliminator's prey to hide, and no amount of protective armour that can stop the killing shot.

entry.name: Necrons/ObeliskDescription
entry.value: Super-heavy skimmer unit with powerful anti-air capabilities that protects nearby allied infantry units.

entry.name: Eldar/HornetDescription
entry.value: Fast reconnaissance skimmer unit that can clear tiles.

entry.name: AdeptusMechanicus/IronstriderBallistariusDescription
entry.value: Doctrina Imperatives fast walker unit equipped with las-cannon.
